title: Alcohol is our problem
brief_description: This video examines the pressures - peer group, media, parents and adults - and reasons why some young people drink alcohol. Interviews with young people, parents, youth workers and psychologists provide an insight into these issues. Suggestions for overcoming the problems are put forward.
